briefTitle: A Study of TMC435 in Participants With Genotype 1 Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection
officialTitle: A Phase III, Open-Label Study in Japan to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of TMC435 as Part of a Treatment Regimen Including Peginterferon Alfa-2b and Ribavirin in Hepatitis C, Genotype 1 Infected Subjects
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of TMC435 in combination with peginterferon alfa-2b and ribavirin in chronic genotype 1 hepatitis C virus (HCV)-infected participants who are treatment-naive or treatment-experienced (prior relapser or non-responder to Interferon-based therapy) in Japan.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants With a Sustained Virologic Response 12 Weeks After the Actual End of Treatment (SVR12)
